Classes/ReceiverTableViewCell.html.abstract: A UITableViewCell for displaying a received message in the MessagesViewController.

Classes/SenderTableViewCell.html.name: SenderTableViewCell
Classes/SenderTableViewCell.html.abstract: A UITableViewCell for displaying a sent message in the MessagesViewControler.

Classes/VoiceMemoReceiverTableViewCell.h.name: VoiceMemoReceiverTableViewCell
Classes/VoiceMemoReceiverTableViewCell.h.abstract: A UITableViewCell for displaying a received voice memo message in the MessagesViewController.

Classes/VoiceMemoSenderTableViewCell.htm.name: VoiceMemoSenderTableViewCell
Classes/VoiceMemoSenderTableViewCell.htm.abstract: A UITableViewCell for displaying a sent voice memo message in the MessagesViewController.

Classes/ChatsViewController.html.name: ChatsViewController
Classes/ChatsViewController.html.abstract: A UIViewController for displaying a list of possible chats that the current user is able to start according to his friends list.

Classes/FriendsRequestsViewController.ht.name: FriendsRequestsViewController
Classes/FriendsRequestsViewController.ht.abstract: A UITableViewController for displaying a list of open friends requests.

Classes/IntroViewController.html.name: IntroViewController
Classes/IntroViewController.html.abstract: A UIViewController for displaying a landing screen at first app launch.

Classes/MessagesViewController.html.name: MessagesViewController
Classes/MessagesViewController.html.abstract: A UIViewController for displaying a chat between two users and displaying and sending their text and voice messages.

Classes/CellViewModel.html.name: CellViewModel
Classes/CellViewModel.html.abstract: A base class for a ViewModel for a UITableViewCell of UICollectionViewCell, containing data.

Classes/DifferentiableObservableListView.name: DifferentiableObservableListViewModel
Classes/DifferentiableObservableListView.abstract: A base class for a differentiable and observable version of the ListViewModel using DifferenceKit.

Classes/ListViewModel.html.name: ListViewModel
Classes/ListViewModel.html.abstract: A base class for a ViewModel for lists.

Classes/CreateAccountIntroViewModel.html.name: CreateAccountIntroViewModel
Classes/CreateAccountIntroViewModel.html.abstract: An IntroViewModel for the creating an account.

Classes/SignInIntroViewModel.html.name: SignInIntroViewModel
Classes/SignInIntroViewModel.html.abstract: An IntroViewModel for signing in to an exisiting account.

Classes/BackendWorker.html.name: BackendWorker
Classes/BackendWorker.html.abstract: A worker class for sending HTTP-requests to the backend.

Classes/SpeechRecognitionWorker.html.name: SpeechRecognitionWorker
Classes/SpeechRecognitionWorker.html.abstract: A worker class for recognizing text in a given audio file.

Classes/StreamWorker.html.name: StreamWorker
Classes/StreamWorker.html.abstract: A worker class for sending and receiving command to and from the stream.

Classes/UsersWorker.html.name: UsersWorker
Classes/UsersWorker.html.abstract: A worker class for handling user related backend requests.

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
